Question: While at school during the 1950s, this person thrived at art assignments, often earning top accolades for his visual work.
Hints: This person became interested in painting after watching artist Willem de Kooning work in de Kooning's Long Island studio.
Considered a high point in the Beatles catalogue, both Lennon and this person claimed lead authorship for the song, "In My Life".
They included mixes of various songs, musical pieces and comments made by this person that Dick James made into a demo for him.
